title: aipadlegend
author: aipadlegend
content: Everyone knows that tens of thousands of new crypto projects are released every day. This over diversity confuses many people, and it causes them to avoid crypto. AIPad Legend is a solution to this problem. Let’s first look for an answer to the question of “What is AIPad legend?”.AIPad Legend is a decentralized AI-based fundraising platform that empowers to launch cryptocurrency projects and raise funds through multi-chain token pools while growing their community.Technical specifications ✅Limited Supply: 17M ✅Low Tax: 4%✅No mint ✅No tax change✅KYC & Audit✅Fair-Tier System✅AI based Launchpad✅Team wallet locked. Functional specifications AIPad Legend enables projects to be;👉 analyzed, tested and evaluated before they are released to investors. 👉 analyzes the technological infrastructure, team and potential of the projects👉  financial structures of the projects are analyzed to provide investors with a better decision-making process💢AIPad Legend; uses blockchain technology to ensure the safety of investors and projects, making transactions transparent and verifiable💢AIPad Legend platform provides a pathway for new cryptocurrency projects and enables safer and more accurate investment decisions for investors.Trust the AI, Trust the Civilization 🤝Official Links: Website: https://aipadlegend.com/Telegram: https://t.me/+4yMHrim1vnM4M2I0Presale: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x33c62861B9166F78a739ED44370BeBe2e312A2Aa?chain=BSChttps://i.imgur.com/aTjoCnx.png
